proposal: Diving into the Floki universe with flokiwifhat, it's clear you're carving a new path for those who missed the first Floki train on ETH. With 32 holders in the ETH network already on board, why not amplify your journey? Imagine deploying your own DEX or engaging your community with a lottery they can call their own. Let's make the Floki legacy not just about holding, but building together.
